welcome_message_body: Welcome to Oak Bay, a charming seaside town known for its stunning beaches, friendly locals, and picturesque views. We hope you'll discover the many hidden gems of our city and make unforgettable memories here. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Friday Harbor Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Friday Harbor Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fairchild International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fairchild International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orcas Island Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orcas Island Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Duncan/Quam Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Duncan/Quam Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Miners Bay Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for handling cargo and freight shipments at Miners Bay Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
